summary: Draw an image from a HTML5 canvas to the layer.

parameters.name: canvas
parameters.description: The HTML5 canvas from which to draw to the layer.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The x coordinate where to place the image on the layer.

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The y coordinate where to place the image on the layer.

platforms.names: Google Chrome, Mozilla FireFox, Internet Explorer 9+, Opera, Safari.
